          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["set -e", [["c"]]],
              [
                " tells bash to stop execution when a command fails, as opposed to continue executing the rest of the script. If a compilation fails, you don't want to run the test. In our case we only have one command "
              ],
              ["go test", [["c"]]],
              [
                " so it makes no difference, but it's a good habit to have in case we'll expand the script in the future"
              ]
